articles.title: Kurt Warner Talks Kyler Murray, Mahomes, Packers, Rams & More with Rich Eisen | Full Interview - The Rich Eisen Show
articles.description: Pro Football Hall of Famer and NFL Network Analyst Kurt Warner tells Rich Eisen why the Cardinals might have been compelled to include a mandatory ‘film stud...
